1604067049_mirrored_HelloZeroNet_github.body: Please note that in python-bitcointx, the python package has just been renamed from 'bitcoin' to 'bitcointx' (https://github.com/Simplexum/python-bitcointx/issues/7). Also, use_libsecp256k1_for_signing() function will be gone after ,https://github.com/Simplexum/python-bitcointx/pull/14 gets merged, because signing with libsecp256k1 will be the default.
